Question: LYF Innovation Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LYF Innovation Ltd.

Product Highlight: Abode Edge Camera

- Wi-Fi HaLow system with over a mile of wireless range
- Six-month battery life
- Object detection and face recognition
- Available within the next few months for $199
- Single-camera subscription plan at $4 a month for AI features and up to 10 days of footage
